summary: A small mod which replaces the look of the Vampire Lord with a Skeletal Lich counterpart.
descriptionHtml:
As stated in the title, this mod replaces the Vampire Lord model with a Skeletal Lich.

This model features in lifestorock\'s Skyrim Immersive Creatures as an enemy called the Skeleton Lord. lifestorock is the creator of this model, and has given me permission to use it as a Vampire Lord replacer in this mod.

Everything about the Vampire Lord functions as before, the only difference is how it looks. This mod is compatible with all other Vampire Lord mods, except those that alter the look of the Vamp Lord (obviously), and also those that alter the Vampire Lord\'s armour.

No other mods are required for this mod to function. Dawnguard DLC is, of course, essential. Works for both male and female characters.

Here is a great video by OdahKing showcasing the mod in action!
[youtube]zM5ss6u3xxE[/youtube]

Send in your Lichy pics! Ill put them on the thread! :D

First Nexus mod! Hope you enjoy! :D
author: TheGreyLight
